resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104246</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104246</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085964</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Get real!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhalten Sie real!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obtenez vrai !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comece real!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenga reale!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάρτε πραγματικός!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Consiga verdadero!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">When teaching computer proficiency to at-risk students, make classroom lessons relevant to their lives and take account of different learning styles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn Sie Computerleistungsfähigkeit Angefahr 
Kursteilnehmer unterrichten, bilden Sie Klassenzimmerlektionen 
relevant zu ihren Lebensdauern und berücksichtigen Sie 
unterschiedliche erlernenarten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En enseignant des étudiants d'à-risque de compétence 
d'ordinateur, rendez les leçons de salle de classe appropriées à 
leurs vies et tenez compte des différents modèles d'étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ao ensinar estudantes do em-risco da proficiência do 
computador, faça lições da sala de aula relevantes a suas vidas e 
faça exame do cliente de estilos de aprendizagem diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nell'insegnare gli allievi di-RISCHIO di competenza del 
calcolatore, renda le lezioni dell'aula relative alle loro vite e 
tenga conto degli stili imparanti differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατά τη διδασκαλία των σπουδαστών-ΚΙΝΔΎΝΟΥ ικανότητας
υπολογιστών, καταστήστε τα μαθήματα τάξεων σχετικά με τις ζωές 
τους και λάβετε υπόψη τις διαφορετικές μορφές εκμάθησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Al enseñar a estudiantes del en-riesgo de la habilidad 
del ordenador, haga las lecciones de la sala de clase relevantes a sus
vidas y tome cuenta de diversos estilos que aprenden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SKIP THIBAULT
FN:SKIP THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085964</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104246</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/get-real</uri>
